metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8730 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
epan/dissectors/packet-nbap.c in the NBAP dissector in Wireshark 1.12.xbefore 1.12.9 and 2.0.x before 2.0.1 does not validate the number of items,which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid readoperation and application crash) via a crafted packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8730` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
libwireshark11 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
libwiretap8 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
libwscodecs2 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
libwsutil9 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
tshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
wireshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
wireshark-common - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
wireshark-gtk - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
wireshark-qt - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.3-1~ubuntu16.04.1').
